author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Charles Barkley to haters: 'F— y'all!'
text:
Updated at 10 a.m. ET 
Updated at 10 a.m. ET 
Charles Barkley has a message for his haters, "F— y'all!' 
The NBA analyst addressed the crowd before taking over the DJ booth at the Koo Koo Room in Atlanta on Tuesday. 
TMZ Sports has the video: 
WARNING: Sir Charles' language is NSFW. 
"I listen to this song everyday I wake up," said Barkley before cueing the Nas classic, "Hate Me Now." 
"For all you f—ing haters, f— y'all!" Barkley yelled. 
Barkley's comments come after days of verbal sparring with LeBron James. 
We can only guess that he was directing his message straight at the Cavs star. Watch This
